sentences.english: At night he would lie sleepless on his cot, suffering an almost unbearable frustration.
sentences.chinese: 晚上他躺在行軍牀上睡不着覺，灰心喪氣難熬難捱。

sentences.english: He was daunted by the amount of work still to be done.
sentences.chinese: 還有那麼多工作要做，弄得他灰心喪氣。

sentences.english: Resist discouragement and finish the race God has set before you.
sentences.chinese: 克服你的灰心喪氣，突破上帝在你面前設下的難關。

sentences.english: Don't let defeat fill you with gloom.
sentences.chinese: 別讓失敗使你灰心喪氣。

sentences.english: Even though I took a tough loss today, I don't feel discouraged in any way.
sentences.chinese: 雖然今天輸了球，我並不覺得十分灰心喪氣。

sentences.english: Trying to change it only frustrates and exhausts you.
sentences.chinese: 試圖改變它只會使你灰心喪氣和精疲力竭。

sentences.english: He despaired at the thought of it.
sentences.chinese: 一想到這件事他就感到灰心喪氣。

sentences.english: Her words made his heart burn with frustration.
sentences.chinese: 她那些話使他極端灰心喪氣。

sentences.english: But to the despondent I whisper that life begins at40.
sentences.chinese: 但對那些灰心喪氣的人我卻低聲說40歲生活纔開始。
